value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05890v1", "title": "Large central values of Dirichlet L-functions in cosets", "summary": "In this paper we consider the distribution of large central values of\nDirichlet L-functions over cosets of the group of characters modulo q via\nSoundararajan's resonator method.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-08T10:34:33Z"}
